plugin.name: rfbsrc
plugin.description: Connects to a VNC server and decodes RFB stream

element.author: David A. Schleef <ds@schleef.org>, Andre Moreira Magalhaes <andre.magalhaes@indt.org.br>, Thijs Vermeir <thijsvermeir@gmail.com>
